style.dbtableQuery: function(data, options) { var bounds = ixmaps.oldBounds = ixmaps.getBoundingBox(); var szBounds = bounds[0].lng + ',' + bounds[0].lat + ',' + bounds[1].lng + ',' + bounds[1].lat; var szUrl = "https://star.cs.ucr.edu/datasets/osm21/pois/download.geojson?mbr="+szBounds; var myfeed = Data.feed({"source":szUrl,"type":"geojson"}).load(function(mydata){ console.log(mydata); if ( mydata ){ mydata.addColumn({destination:"genus",source:"tagsMap"},function(value){ var json = JSON.parse(value); return json["taxon:species"]||""; }); mydata.addColumn({destination:"circumference",source:"tagsMap"},function(value){ var json = JSON.parse(value); return json["circumference"]||""; }); ixmaps.setExternalData(mydata,{type:"jsonDB",name:options.name}); ixmaps.setTitle(""); } }) }
style.name: features
style.title: [title]
